Ashraam VanEyre
Tuesday, September 26th, 2017, 1:54:03 PM

Just make sure you have enough spell ranks to ward successfully, so you can use 301 on undead and another disable (118 maybe) on the living in order to keep your AS viable. Also, you could consider a mechanical crossbow. The attack speed is 1-2 seconds slower than a bow (properly trained), but you can abuse the +30 AS from kneeling as a cleric with 319.
